title: [Sponsor] Wifi Dabba
content:
Wifi Dabba is deploying 100,000 public wifi hotspots at neighborhood tea stalls across Bangalore city. We’re creating a low cost connectivity layer powered by lasers for a billion underserved Indians.

2,000 Wifi Dabba hotspots are live across the city in homes, offices and retail stores. They form a public wifi mesh network that delivers super fast, super cheap internet to data hungry users. The average user on our network is 20 years old and consumes 3gb of data each day.

We’ve tokenized our network to enable anyone, anywhere in the world to buy a hotspot for $100 and mint tokens when data is sold. Track your hotspot’s performance remotely from the dashboard while we take care of deployment, operations and customer support on ground.

Apply the code DARINGFIREBALL at checkout and get 2× the number of hotspots you pay for. This offer is exclusive for the DF audience.
